description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter UI screen for the 'Assigned Deliveries' view in a delivery management app. It includes a stateless widget to display the screen with route navigation, authorization check, header and list item components, and uses various theme and permission services.

classes.name: DeliveryAssignedDeliveriesScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the assigned deliveries screen, including authorization checking and layout for delivery queue and placeholders.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget that renders the header section of the delivery screen with themed decoration and icon.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private StatelessWidget representing a row item with an icon and text, used for placeholders or list entries.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the screen or component, constructing the UI based on the current context.
